snippet.title: Ritual Night - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Learn about your objectives and more about Ritual Night in this trailer for the upcoming rogue-lite social deduction game featuring no elimination. Through teamwork and betrayal, attempt a ritual to summon Cthulhu. Watch out! Someone is an icky human who wants to sabotage the ritual. After every round, the game evolves, granting potent magic powers to each side to deduce or deceive. Ritual Night will be available on PC in Fall 2023, and a beta for the game is available now.

#GameTrailers #SoG #Gaming
